translation.en: [woman] "Do you believe in love at first sight?"
Those were the words that started the whole Emma Gale success story.
translation.zh: 艾玛盖尔系列小说的成功就是从这两句话开始的

translation.en: And for 20 years and 12 novels, it seemed like nothing could go wrong.
translation.zh: 20年间出了12本小说似乎一切都顺风顺水

translation.en: [assistant] Hello, Ms. Brown. Welcome to The Drew Barrymore Show.
translation.zh: 你好 布朗女士欢迎来到《德鲁巴里摩尔秀》

translation.en: Can't I just go home and wait until this blows over?
translation.zh: 我能回家避避这波风头吗？

translation.en: This is not blowing over. This is a Category 5.
translation.zh: 这可不是小风头 这是五级飓风

translation.en: Do you know how many people hate you because of this book?
translation.zh: 你知道多少人因为这本书讨厌你吗？

translation.en: -I thought you were my friend. -Well, right now, I'm your agent.
translation.zh: -我还以为你是我朋友-但是现在 我是你的经纪人

translation.en: So go out there and charm everybody's pants off.
translation.zh: 所以赶紧出去 用魅力征服所有人吧

translation.en: And try not to look so tall.
I suppose it's possible you might not have read a Sophie Brown novel,
translation.zh: 或许有人没读过索菲布朗的小说

translation.en: but trust me, you know somebody who has,
translation.zh: 但相信我 你认识的人一定读过

translation.en: and, boy, do I have some questions for her.
translation.zh: 老天 我确实有问题要问她

translation.en: [man] Hm. Join us in welcoming back my good friend and best-selling author, Sophie Brown!
translation.zh: 一起欢迎我的好朋友畅销书作家索菲布朗回归！

translation.en: Thank you for having me. I'm surprised I made it in alive.
translation.zh: 谢谢你邀请我 我居然能活着上节目

translation.en: All of you viewers, if you wonder what we're talking about,
translation.zh: 观众们如果你对我们说的事情一头雾水

translation.en: I'd say that Sophie Brown has a whole lot of unhappy fans out there.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 索菲布朗有一群很不开心的粉丝

translation.en: Well, I think you might mean former fans.
Well, I guess we're all wondering about the ending of your latest book.
translation.zh: 我想我们都对你最新作品的结局困惑不已

translation.en: I know that the character of Winston charmed many of the readers.
translation.zh: 我知道温斯顿这个角色迷倒了很多读者

translation.en: Then why in the world would you kill him?
translation.zh: 那你为什么要写死他呢？
你的读者都超爱温斯顿

translation.en: Maybe they just didn't know him like I did.
translation.zh: 也许我比读者更了解他

translation.en: We don't always get the happy ending.
translation.zh: 小说不一定都是幸福的结局

translation.en: You know, I normally don't do this,
but I have got to agree with the fans out there.
translation.zh: 但我不得不和粉丝站在一起

translation.en: He didn't deserve to fall down the stairs.
translation.zh: 从楼梯上摔下来对他太残忍了
所以你是他们那边的了？

translation.en: Well, you murdered a man that I was in love with.
translation.zh: 你“杀死”了一个我爱的男人

translation.en: I mean, what gives you the right to take him away?
I know, but perhaps you're having a hard time
translation.zh: 我知道 或许你现在很难

translation.en: separating your real life from the fiction in your books.
translation.zh: 将现实生活和书中的虚构情节分开

translation.en: -What? -[Drew] Well, you've had a rough year.
Your husband left you. You had a very messy divorce.
translation.zh: 你丈夫离开了你你的离婚闹得很不体面

translation.en: Okay, but Winston is a fictional character.
translation.zh: 但温斯顿是个虚构的角色

translation.en: And you should be happy that it was a quick death, yeah,
translation.zh: 你应该庆幸他死得干脆利落

translation.en: because I could have extended it for ten pages.
translation.zh: 我本可以把这过程延长成十页的内容

translation.en: I could have dragged him behind a car. I could have poisoned him with mercury.
translation.zh: 我本可以用车拖死他还可以用水银毒死他

translation.en: I could have chopped him into little, teeny pieces
translation.zh: 我还可以把他剁得粉碎

translation.en: and fed him to the sharks!
-[TV show theme music playing] -We'll be right back.
I became a writer so I could write in my pajamas,
translation.zh: 我成为作家是因为我想穿着睡衣写作

translation.en: not so I could get yelled at by strangers.
translation.zh: 而不是为了被陌生人教训

translation.en: I thought you became a writer because of Grandpa.
translation.zh: 我还以为你是因为外公才当的作家

translation.en: You used to sit in the barbershop and listen to his stories, right?
translation.zh: 你以前会坐在理发店听他讲故事

translation.en: He had told me that he snuck in once. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他告诉我他偷偷溜进去过一次

translation.en: He told that one a lot.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay? 'Cause I can come back next weekend.
translation.zh: 你真的没事吗？我下周末可以回来

translation.en: Absolutely not. You stay at school. Don't worry about me. I got this.
translation.zh: 完全没事 你留在学校不用担心我 我可以的

translation.en: [Sophie] I need to forget about the Emma Gale fiasco for a while.
translation.zh: 我需要暂时忘记艾玛盖尔带来的风波

translation.en: It's hidden away, and it's quiet, and nobody knows me there.
translation.zh: 那里隐秘安静 而且没人认识我

translation.en: Mom, this is great. You're finally taking a vacation.
translation.zh: 妈妈 太好了 你终于要去度假了

translation.en: Just until the bad press dies down.
translation.zh: 直到负面报道偃旗息鼓

translation.en: I can write the new Emma Gale,
translation.zh: 我可以写艾玛盖尔系列的新书

translation.en: bring Winston back, and everything will be back to normal.
translation.zh: 让温斯顿复活 一切都会恢复如常

translation.en: All right, well, at least promise me you'll see the castle.
translation.zh: 好吧 至少你要保证会去看城堡

translation.en: [in Scottish accent] Nobody told me that.
[in Scottish accent] Where are you from?
This is all the luggage I have.
-[in Scottish accent] It's not a problem. -Oh. Thank you.
♪ Sometimes we get away with it ♪ ♪ Sometimes we get burned… ♪
translation.zh: （舒适床位 苏格兰式早餐当地旅游资讯）

translation.en: ♪ Sometimes we can just learn from it ♪
translation.zh: （舒适床位 苏格兰式早餐当地旅游资讯） （美味食物 热情欢迎）
哈米什 不要！ 哈米什 停下！

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you were… here.

translation.zh: 它通常不太喜欢陌生人

translation.en: [Sophie] Hey. Are you the welcoming committee?
translation.zh: 嘿 你是欢迎委员会的吗？

translation.en: Oh, hi. May I help you?
translation.zh: 嗨 有什么能帮忙的吗？

translation.en: In our wee village? Dinna be daft.
translation.zh: 来我们这个小破村？别犯傻了

translation.en: I have a reservation under Sophie Brown.
translation.zh: 我用索菲布朗的名字预订了房间

translation.en: Not sure I should admit it, but, uh, yes. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我不知道是否该承认 但没错

translation.en: I've read all your books. [chuckles] I just finished the last one.
translation.zh: 我读过你所有的书而且刚读完最后一本

translation.en: -May I ask you a question, then? -Sure.
Why'd you leave it so long to kill off Winston?
translation.zh: 你为什么要等那么久才写死温斯顿？

translation.en: -What? -I was hoping you'd do it in volume one.
translation.zh: -什么？-我希望你第一卷就写死他

translation.en: I never liked that sod. Too bloody perfect.
translation.zh: 我一直不喜欢那个烦人精那家伙完美过头了

translation.en: You know what? I'm not so sure I did either.
translation.zh: 其实 我好像也不喜欢那家伙

translation.en: -[chuckles] I killed him off. -Good for you, Sophie Brown. [laughs]
translation.zh: -我弄死他了-干得漂亮 索菲布朗

translation.en: [Sophie] Sod. Got any other names for him?
translation.zh: 烦人精 他还有别的绰号吗？

translation.en: That's very kind. I'm sure it's not what you're used to.
translation.zh: 你真善良你平时肯定不住在这种地方

translation.en: …it is exactly what I was hoping for.
[woman] Aye, it's just over the hill.
Well, if you need anything else, Ms. Brown, just ring.
translation.zh: 布朗女士 如果你有别的需要按铃就可以
谢谢你 叫我索菲就好

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Maisie. You too.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你 梅茜-我也是

translation.en: [agent] Scotland? Really? Why didn't you clear this with me first?
translation.zh: 苏格兰？真的吗？你怎么不直接跟我说实话？

translation.en: Because you would have talked me out of it.
-How long have we known each other? -Too long.
Since page one, book four. And when have I ever steered you wrong?
translation.zh: 从第四本书的第一页开始我何时为你做过错误的决定？

translation.en: -The title of book six. -Oh, aside from that!
Don't worry. I'm here to write.
translation.zh: 别担心 我是来写作的

translation.en: Good, and when can I expect to see pages?
translation.zh: 很好 我什么时候能看到稿子？
很快 我现在文思泉涌

translation.en: Right, now, the gift shop is right here.
translation.zh: 对了 礼品店就在这里

translation.en: Uh, no, you've missed the… the gift shop.
translation.zh: 别走啊 你们错过了礼品店

translation.en: No? Well, surely you don't wanna leave without a souvenir.
translation.zh: 不要吗？大家肯定想带纪念品回去吧

translation.en: Kilts, tea towels, coasters? All with the clan coat of arms, of course.
translation.zh: 苏格兰裙、茶巾、杯垫？当然了 都有家族纹章的

translation.en: Well, may your travels be swift.
[guide] Aye, well, perhaps one of them could be fixing the door to the library.
translation.zh: 也许其中一件是修理通向图书馆的门

translation.en: -It's hard to get the people in. -Aye, it's even harder to get them out.
-So you work here too? -Wherever they'll have me.
translation.zh: -你也在这里工作吗？-有需要我就来

translation.en: You just missed the tour, but the next one's Thursday.
translation.zh: 你刚刚错过了参观 下一场是周四

translation.en: Oh, well, um, could I just wander around a little on my own?
translation.zh: 我可以一个人简单逛逛吗？

translation.en: It's all right, Thomas. I'll give her a tour.
translation.zh: 没关系 托马斯 我带她参观

translation.en: -I wouldn't want to get you in trouble. -Take my chances.
translation.zh: -我不想害你惹上麻烦-我就碰碰运气吧

translation.en: [man] There are more than 3,000 castles in Scotland.
Some date back to the 14th century.
These grand old ladies hold the proud history
translation.zh: 这些宏伟的“老古董”承载着

translation.en: of all those who lived, worked, and fought here.
translation.zh: 我们生活、劳作以及战斗的光荣历史

translation.en: This here is the music room
where the third duchess wrote a book of poems.
translation.zh: 第三任公爵夫人在这里写了一本诗歌集

translation.en: -Have you read it? -Aye, and I wouldn't recommend it.
translation.zh: 你读过吗？ 读过 但我不推荐你读

translation.en: -So you're here for the day, then? -A little longer.
translation.zh: -你就在这里待一天吗？-比那稍微久一点

translation.en: Aye. Tourists don't usually stay in our village.
translation.zh: 游客通常不会住在我们村子里

translation.en: We're more of what you call a drive-through.
translation.zh: 这里更像是免下车快餐店

translation.en: Dun Dunbar was built by the first Duke of Dunbar for his wife.
translation.zh: 邓巴城堡是第一任邓巴公爵为他妻子建造的

translation.en: Been in the same family for 500 years.
translation.zh: 五百年来由同一个家族传承

translation.en: -Who owns it now? -Just some royal arse.
translation.zh: -现在它归谁所有？-某个臭屁王室子弟

translation.en: -[dog collar clinking] -Hamish! Hamish. -[Sophie] Oh my goodness. Oh! -[Hamish whimpers]
Never seen him like this. Have you meat in your pocket?
translation.zh: 我从来没见过它这样你口袋里有肉吗？

translation.en: I always carry a steak on my person. [laughs]
Out now. Go on. Get out. Go on!
So, this is the older part of the castle.
The Dunbars had meetings of the clan and grand celebrations in here.
translation.zh: 邓巴家族会在这里举行家族会议和盛大的庆祝活动
这个楼梯是顺时针建造的

translation.en: Apparently, the best way to defend by a right-handed swordsman.
translation.zh: 很明显 这样设计最有利于右撇子剑客进行防守

translation.en: I guess the, uh, royal arse needs a lot of thrones.
translation.zh: 看来那位臭屁王室子弟屎尿挺多

translation.en: -Can we go up? -Sorry, not part of the tour.
translation.zh: -我们可以去上面吗？-抱歉 那里不对外开放

translation.en: Can I steal you away from the tour for a moment?
There's a couple wanting to talk about a wedding. All right. How do they look?
translation.zh: -有一对要办婚礼的情侣来了-他们看上去怎样？
-看起来实力雄厚-你就待在这里

translation.en: At the top of the stairs, there are three doors.
translation.zh: 楼梯的最顶层有三扇门
（莱克茜！快看！我找到了他的名字！）
（莱克茜！快看！我找到了他的名字！） 你好 女士？

translation.en: I just needed to see something.
And what could you possibly need to see up here?
Okay, the thing is, I have a little family history in this place.
translation.zh: 是这样的这个地方跟我的家族有点渊源

translation.en: Don't tell me. You did a DNA test, and your ancestor's Mary Queen of Scots?
translation.zh: 别告诉我 难道你做了亲子鉴定发现祖先是苏格兰玛丽女王？

translation.en: Do you know why no one's allowed up here?
translation.zh: 你知道为何上面禁止参观吗？

translation.en: I'm guessing frostbite. Because it's someone's home.
translation.zh: -我猜是因为怕游客被冻伤-因为这里是别人的家

translation.en: How would you like a parade of gawkers traipsing through yours?
translation.zh: 你会允许一群看热闹的人在自己家闲晃吗？

translation.en: Well, consider it a tip for your warmth and hospitality.
translation.zh: 就当是给你热情好客的小费吧

translation.en: Well, here's a tip for you.
Stay out of places you don't belong.
translation.zh: 别去自己不该去的地方

translation.en: -[woman 1] I would love to see you dance. -[woman 2] Well, those were the days.
translation.zh: -我很想看你跳舞-那都是以前了

translation.en: -[woman 1] Go on, then. Give us a show. -[woman 2 laughs]
translation.zh: 来吧 给我们表演一下

translation.en: -[Maisie] Oh, I'd like to see that. -Hi.
-Enjoy the castle? -I did, yes. It was magical.
translation.zh: -城堡还不错吧？-非常好 美轮美奂

translation.en: -I rather love them too. -We've read every one.
translation.zh: -我也很喜欢-我们每本都读过

translation.en: -I told them not to bother you. -[Sophie] Are you kidding?
translation.zh: -我叫她们别打扰你的-开什么玩笑？

translation.en: You may be the only readers left who don't hate me.
translation.zh: 你们可能是为数不多的不讨厌我的读者了

translation.en: Oh, no. I mean, I've always wanted to learn, but…
translation.zh: 不会 我一直想学 但是…

translation.en: Oh! Well, these might come in handy.
translation.zh: 这样啊 那这些可能会有用

translation.en: Then you can join our club.
translation.zh: 这样你就可以加入我们的俱乐部了

translation.en: I'm a pastry chef, but for now, I make biscuits in the bakery across the way.
translation.zh: 我是糕点师但我暂时在街对面的面包店做饼干

translation.en: His husband was one of the original members, but he passed on.
translation.zh: 他的丈夫也是初创成员之一但他去世了

translation.en: Not long after, Angus showed up. Hasn't stopped knitting since.
translation.zh: 不久之后 安格斯就过来了然后就一直织了下去

translation.en: Here, would you like me to show you how to knit?
-Oh, it's hard when they move away. -It's harder when they move back in.
translation.zh: -孩子离家是件令人难过的事-搬回家更令人难过

translation.en: Uh, it's been a year since my divorce.
I've got a boyfriend in the bakery.
translation.zh: 我在面包店有个男朋友

translation.en: -He just doesn't know it yet! -I'm still married.
translation.zh: -不过他还不知道！-我还是已婚

translation.en: Although, I'm not sure he knows it either.
translation.zh: 虽然我也不确定他知不知道

translation.en: -[Sophie laughs] -Not true. You two are madly in love. We are.
translation.zh: -不是的 你们疯狂爱着彼此-确实如此

translation.en: It's nice to hear him laugh like that. He hasn't spoken a word since Graham died.
translation.zh: 真高兴能听到他这样大笑格雷厄姆死后 他变成了哑巴一样

translation.en: you chose our little village to write the next Emma Gale!
translation.zh: 你选择我们这个小村子写下一本艾玛盖尔系列的书！

translation.en: Well, I was supposed to come here a long time ago with my dad.
translation.zh: 我很早之前就该跟爸爸过来的

translation.en: But he got sick, and we never made it.
translation.zh: 但他生病了 我们一直没机会来

translation.en: He lived at Dunbar Castle as a kid.
translation.zh: 他小时候住在邓巴城堡

translation.en: Well, outside the castle. They weren't allowed inside.
translation.zh: 其实是住在城堡外 他们不能进去

translation.en: -His family, they were the groundskeepers. -You mean your family?
translation.zh: -他家是城堡的园丁-你是说你家吗？

translation.en: Ah, you're one of us, then. [chuckles]
McGuinty. I… I don't think I've heard that name around here.
translation.zh: 麦坚迪 这边好像没姓这个的

translation.en: Well, they moved to New York when he was a boy.
translation.zh: 他小时候 他们举家搬到了纽约

translation.en: I was at school with a McGuinty back in the day.
translation.zh: 我以前和一个姓麦坚迪的人当过同学

translation.en: Always blethering and telling the tales.
translation.zh: 一直在胡吹海侃地讲些故事

translation.en: Of course, we called him something else.
translation.zh: 不过我们给他取了个绰号

translation.en: [sobs] Oh, I don't know why I'm crying.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己为什么会哭

translation.en: Because these are your roots, dear.
translation.zh: 因为你的根在这里 亲爱的

translation.en: I wish I'd come back sooner.
translation.zh: 我要是早点回来就好了

translation.en: And you got to see Dun Dunbar while it's still a castle.
translation.zh: 你还能看看邓巴作为城堡的样子

translation.en: -What do you mean? -It's… it's up for sale.
A lot of the old castles are for sale.
Aberdeenshire's cheaper than a Range Rover.
translation.zh: 阿伯丁郡的地产比一辆路虎车都便宜

translation.en: And you'd be more comfortable living in a Range Rover.
translation.zh: 还是住在路虎车里更舒服一些

translation.en: [man] So someone wants a trophy castle?
translation.zh: 有人想买一座城堡用来炫耀？

translation.en: It's worse, then. They wanna tear it down for condos and a golf course.
translation.zh: 那就更糟了 他们想拆掉城堡盖公寓和高尔夫球场

translation.en: I'm doing the tours and the gift shop.
translation.zh: 我带人参观城堡 也开了礼品店

translation.en: I've agreed to the weddings and… and maybe even a funeral or two.
translation.zh: 我已经答应承办婚礼了可能还会举办一两场葬礼

translation.en: Look, we've been mates for a long time.
translation.zh: 我们是这么多年的朋友

translation.en: I've bent over backwards, keeping you out of foreclosure.
translation.zh: 我费了很大的功夫才没让你丧失抵押赎回权

translation.en: I just need a little more time, Ian.
translation.zh: 我只是需要更多时间 伊恩

translation.en: There is no more time unless you sell off the farmlands.
translation.zh: 没有时间了 除非你卖掉农场

translation.en: -Sophie Brown. Myles Dunbar. -You're the royal arse?
translation.zh: -索菲布朗 这是迈尔斯邓巴-你就是那个王室臭屁子弟？

translation.en: -You're the buyer? -He let me think he worked here.
translation.zh: -你就是买家？-他让我误会他是这里的工作人员

translation.en: And you can't just show up and decide to buy a castle, like some hamburger.
translation.zh: 你不能突然出现 像买汉堡一样随随便便买下一座城堡

translation.en: -Well, you did say it was a drive-through. -I'm not selling to her.
translation.zh: 你确实说过这里是快餐店 我不卖给她

translation.en: Uh, Myles is the 12th Duke of Dunbar.
translation.zh: 迈尔斯是第12任邓巴公爵

translation.en: Oh, well, forgive me, Your Highness.
I can think of a few other names I'd call you.
translation.zh: 我可以另外给你起几个称呼

translation.en: And you wouldn't be the first.
translation.zh: 那你不会是第一个人这么想的人

translation.en: the title does not come with the land.
So if that's what you're after, you can buy a ladyship online for £30.
translation.zh: 如果你想要的是头衔可以花30英镑网购贵族夫人头衔

translation.en: The only title I'm interested in is my next book,
translation.zh: 我只对自己下一本书的“头衔”感兴趣

translation.en: which I'm going to write at Dun Dunbar in the library.
translation.zh: 我要在邓巴城堡图书馆创作这本小说

translation.en: I'm not giving up 500 years of history on someone's whim.
translation.zh: 我才不会因为某人一时兴起就放弃500年的历史

translation.en: -It is not a whim. -Oh my. What is it, then?
translation.zh: -这不是一时兴起-那这是什么？

translation.en: Do you believe in love at first sight?
But if I did, that would be what I felt when I saw Dun Dunbar.
translation.zh: 但倘若我相信的话那就是我看到邓巴城堡的感觉

translation.en: On the grounds. A long time ago.
translation.zh: 他住在城堡外 很久以前了
-他们一家服侍你们家族-换个招数吧

translation.en: I thought that dukes were supposed to be gentlemen.
translation.zh: 我还以为公爵都是绅士
好吧 这显然就是个错误
-不客气-我不是谢你 是谢他

translation.en: You realize you just handed over Dun Dunbar to the bank?
translation.zh: 你知道自己刚刚亲手把邓巴城堡交给银行了吗？

translation.en: to obliterate the memory of the most awful, arrogant person you've ever met?
translation.zh: 我想抹去记忆里脾气最差、最傲慢的人

translation.en: He's lived here his whole life.
I've had a change of heart. Oh, so you actually have one.
translation.zh: -我改变心意了-原来你还有心啊

translation.en: If I agree to this, there are conditions.
translation.zh: 让我同意卖给你城堡 有几个条件
三个月的第三方托管 直到圣诞节

translation.en: I am not living with you.
Look, this has nothing to do with you and me.
translation.zh: 听着 这和你我无关

translation.en: There is no you and me.
Exactly. If I'm gonna sell the old girl, I need to know you can take care of her.
translation.zh: 没错 如果我要卖掉这宝贝我需要知道你会精心照顾它

translation.en: And you need to know how hard that is.
translation.zh: 你也需要知道这有多难

translation.en: Dun Dunbar is a living, breathing thing.
translation.zh: 邓巴城堡是有生命的建筑物

translation.en: or she'll crumble like an oatcake in the rain.
translation.zh: 否则它会像雨中的燕麦饼一样碎掉

translation.en: Gift shop? Two quid. I'll throw it into the deal.
translation.zh: -礼品店拿的？-两英镑一支 我会写进合同里

translation.en: She'll realize the mistake she made and be gone in a week.
translation.zh: 一周后 她就会知道自己犯了大错然后落荒而逃

translation.en: Meanwhile, her deposit will get us through spring,
translation.zh: 与此同时她的定金会帮我们撑过春天

translation.en: and I'll figure out something after that.
-And if she doesn't leave? -Oh, she'll leave.
translation.zh: -如果她不走呢？-她一定会走的

translation.en: I'll make her life so miserable she'll never want to see a castle again.
translation.zh: 我会让她过得生不如死城堡会成为她一生的阴影

translation.en: Aye. Well, you do have a knack of driving people away.
translation.zh: 好吧 你赶人走确实有一套

translation.en: Aye, but you pay me. Barely. Besides, who else would put up with you?
translation.zh: 对啊 因为你给我工钱 但也不怎么给而且除了我 谁还受得了你呢？

translation.en: "Slainte" is what we say in Scotland.
translation.zh: 苏格兰的说法是“祝你健康”
祝你健康 好了 干杯吧

translation.en: Wait, wait. I thought you said you were buying a castle. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 等等 你说你要买城堡？

translation.en: I did. Mom, are you drunk?
Oh! Not anymore. I'm buying Dun Dunbar.
translation.zh: 现在酒醒了 我要买下邓巴城堡

translation.en: Oh, I… I can't explain it.
Um, except for the fact that I think he would want me to.
translation.zh: 只是感觉你外公会希望我这样做

translation.en: I can almost picture his face when I walk through that door with the key.
translation.zh: 我可以想象当我拿着钥匙走进那扇门 他会是什么表情

translation.en: I haven't seen you smile like this in a really long time.
translation.zh: 我很久没见过你这样笑了

translation.en: [chuckles] I know. It's like it was meant to be.
translation.zh: 我知道 这就好像命中注定一样

translation.en: Although I have to live with him till Christmas.
translation.zh: 虽然我得跟那个人住到圣诞节

translation.en: Here. The key to my castle.
translation.zh: 给你 我城堡的钥匙

translation.en: Now you get the real tour.
translation.zh: 现在你可以真正参观一下了

translation.en: you should know, here on the estate, we have a community-owned wind farm
translation.zh: 你要知道 庄园里有一个归社区所有的风力发电厂

translation.en: where we create 70% of our energy.
translation.zh: 我们七成的电力来源于此

translation.en: We also have sustainable forestry and organic farming.
translation.zh: 我们还拥有可持续林业以及有机农业

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Four years at Oxford, two years Cambridge.
translation.zh: 我读了四年牛津大学 两年剑桥大学
亚麻床单壁橱 洗手间
-我可能需要一张地图-礼品店有卖 五英镑

translation.en: And this here is Flemish, 16th century.
translation.zh: 这是弗拉芒画派的作品 16世纪的
穿过这扇门 就是我的房间

translation.en: I will have no reason to go in there. We agree on that.
translation.zh: -我绝对不会进去的-这点我们可以达成共识

translation.en: More rooms. No power, leaky roof.
translation.zh: 还有更多房间 不通电 屋顶漏水

translation.en: The fifth duke died in here, in that very bed.
translation.zh: 第五任公爵在这里去世的就在这张床上

translation.en: [Myles] There's a reason they set horror movies in castles.
translation.zh: 人们在城堡里拍恐怖片是有原因的

translation.en: It leaks after every rain, and it rains 150 days a year.
translation.zh: 每次雨后都会漏水而且这里一年150天下雨
管道时而通畅 时而不通60个壁炉只有一半能用

translation.en: Oh, by the way, we don't heat the upstairs.
translation.zh: 对了 楼上没有供暖

translation.en: So, you'll stay in this one.
[scoffs] Are you sure the duke didn't die in this room,
translation.zh: 你确定这里没有死去的公爵

translation.en: and he's still in here somewhere?
-Why? -[clears throat] Is this room not up to your standards?
translation.zh: 怎么了？这房间达不到你的标准吗？

translation.en: Is there a closet? There's a chair.
Oh, by the way, I looked up your family. There's no Brown in the records.
translation.zh: 对了 我查了你家记录上没有姓布朗的

translation.en: -That's my married name. -Oh, you're married, then?
translation.zh: 那是我的夫姓 -你结婚了？-离了

translation.en: Aye, now that I can believe.
McGuinty. He got caught before he could finish.
translation.zh: 麦坚迪 他还没刻完就被抓住了

translation.en: Didn't think there was anything here I hadn't seen. When was this?
translation.zh: 我还以为这里的东西我都见过了这是什么时候刻的？

translation.en: Sixty years ago. He was a kid.
He snuck in and made it upstairs.
He just wanted someone to know he got inside.
translation.zh: 他想让别人知道他进来了

translation.en: But some heartless stuffed shirt tossed him out and fired his father.
translation.zh: 但是某个无情的自大狂把他扔了出去 开除了他爸爸
我也这么说过他的坏话

translation.en: My old man wasn't much better.
translation.zh: 我老爸也好不到哪里去

translation.en: McGuinty, it's a strong name. You should stick with that.
translation.zh: 麦坚迪 这个名字很有气势你应该沿用下去

translation.en: -Should we go get a cup of tea? -[barks, groans]

translation.zh: 我们迷路了 哈米什

translation.en: All I want is a cup of tea. Is that too much to ask?
translation.zh: 我只想喝杯茶 这要求很过分吗？

translation.en: I thought that… that this was the kitchen.
As long as you're here, do you mind pouring me another?
translation.zh: 既然来了 可以帮我再倒一杯吗？

translation.en: -You could've locked the door. -Why? It's my house.
translation.zh: -你可以把门锁上的-为什么？这里是我家
真是多谢你 哈米什

translation.en: [Sophie] Be happy that it was a quick death. I could have extended it for ten pages.
translation.zh: 你应该庆幸他死得干脆利落我本可以把这过程延长成十页的内容

translation.en: I could have dragged him behind a car. I could have poisoned him with mercury.
translation.zh: 我本可以用车拖死他 还可以用水银毒死他

translation.en: I could have chopped him into little, teeny pieces
translation.zh: 我还可以把他剁得粉碎

translation.en: and fed him to the sharks!
Page one. "Do you believe in love at first sight? I didn't used to."
translation.zh: 第一页 “你相信一见钟情吗？我以前不相信”

translation.en: Now, where have I heard that before? Oh, right. Your sales pitch.
translation.zh: 我以前从哪听到过这话呢？对了 是你的推销口号

translation.en: "The first time I laid eyes on Winston,
-Are you gonna read the whole thing to me? -No, page one's good enough for me.
translation.zh: -你要把这本书都读给我听吗？-不 第一页对我来说就够了

translation.en: If you are trying to discourage me,
a cold room and a couple of bats in the attic are not gonna do it.
translation.zh: 一间冰冷的卧室和阁楼上的几只蝙蝠根本没用

translation.en: "'I will not be discouraged,' said Emma. 'I will get what I came for.'"
translation.zh: “‘我不会被击垮的’ 艾玛说‘我会实现自己的目标’”

translation.en: Yeah, this is Pulitzer Prize stuff, this.
translation.zh: 这书居然得过普利策奖 真是的

translation.en: Well, you remember what happened when it was purple, don't you?
translation.zh: 你还记得当初把它染成紫色的下场吧？

translation.en: Yarn bombing. It's a thing. Perks up the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 毛线轰炸 很流行的 让社区充满活力

translation.en: -How was your first night at the castle? -Cold.
translation.zh: -你在城堡的第一夜过得怎么样？-冷冰冰的

translation.en: Well, you're just in time to stop this massacre.
translation.zh: 你正好及时制止了一场大屠杀

translation.en: Rhona wants to chop it off and dye it green.
translation.zh: 罗娜想把那玩意剪短 染成绿色

translation.en: Ooh. I really hope we're talking about hair.
translation.zh: 真希望我们谈的是头发

translation.en: I grew up over a barbershop owned by the best scissor man in Queens,
translation.zh: 我在皇后区一家理发店长大老板是那一带手艺最好的理发师

translation.en: and an expert colorist. Let's do it.
translation.zh: 同时也是染发专家 来吧

translation.en: -[Rhona] So, I think a bit of color. -[Sophie] Okay, all right.
translation.zh: -我想染个颜色-好的 可以

translation.en: Hi. Yeah, I'm gonna need your help.
translation.zh: 嗨 我需要你的帮助

translation.en: -[Helen] Does she know we're coming? -[Maisie] I just texted her.
translation.zh: -她知道我们要来吗？-我刚发短信给她了
快点吧 慢吞吞的家伙们

translation.en: [Helen] That will be lovely up there in that room.
translation.zh: 这东西放在那房间会很漂亮

translation.en: [Maisie] Ah, yeah, we're right behind you, Speedy Gonzales. I see you running off.
translation.zh: 我们就在你后面 飞毛腿冈萨雷斯我看到你跑走了

translation.en: [Helen] Dinna hang back. Knitters to the rescue.
translation.zh: 不要畏缩不前 编织侠前来救援

translation.en: -I've never been up the stairs before. -Well, it's clear you haven't missed much.
translation.zh: -我以前都没上来过-明显你并没有错过什么

translation.en: -Not as perfect as my hair. -I have to admit, it does suit you.
translation.zh: -没我的头发完美-不得不说 确实和你很搭

translation.en: Well, this is looking rather nice.
Where's the Scotch dresser? And the lamps?
translation.zh: 苏格兰式梳妆台呢？台灯呢？
-好吧 你们两个怎么回事？-没什么

translation.en: Oh, that's been going on forever.
Maybe we dated for a bit before I married Sean.
translation.zh: 我和肖恩结婚前 跟他约过几次会

translation.en: Well, you're not married now, are you?
translation.zh: 但你现在离婚了 对吧？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know how to thank you.
translation.zh: 我真不知道该怎么感谢你们

translation.en: Not necessary. We knitters look after each other.
translation.zh: 不用了 织友就要守望相助

translation.en: No one crosses the knitters. Right, Angus?
translation.zh: 谁都不许惹编织者联盟对吧 安格斯？

translation.en: You know, I've known Myles my whole life.
translation.zh: 其实 我认识迈尔斯一辈子了

translation.en: After you get past that upper crust, he's got a good heart.
translation.zh: 一旦你看透他上流社会的掩饰就会发现他很善良

translation.en: -[scoffs] -It might be hard to see right now.
You couldn't find a better landlord. That's for certain.
translation.zh: 你肯定找不到比他更好的地主了

translation.en: My family has been tenants on the Dunbar land for generations.
translation.zh: 我家好几代人都是邓巴家的佃户

translation.en: The 11th duke squandered what remained of the family money,
translation.zh: 第11任公爵败光了剩下的家产

translation.en: left Myles with an empty title,
translation.zh: 只给迈尔斯留下了一个空头衔

translation.en: a mountain of debt, and the whole village counting on him.
translation.zh: 还有巨额债务 全村都指望着他

translation.en: It's the reason he's selling the castle.
translation.zh: 这就是他卖掉城堡的原因

translation.en: So he can pay off the debt on the farmlands.
translation.zh: 这样他才能还清农场的债务
这样的话 不管发生什么

translation.en: we'll all have a place to live. Hm.
Come after finals. We can have Christmas here.
translation.zh: 期末考试后过来我们可以在这里过圣诞节

translation.en: Mom, Dad didn't tell you. Dad didn't tell me what?
translation.zh: -妈妈 爸爸没有告诉你-告诉我什么？
他要在圣诞节和那个女人结婚

translation.en: I… I told him I'd go, but I really don't have to.
translation.zh: 我告诉他我会去参加婚礼但我没必要非得去
亲爱的 你得去参加
这是我女儿 莱克茜

translation.en: Oh, uh, nice to meet you. You too.
The damp air degrades the books.
translation.zh: 潮湿的空气会破坏书本

translation.en: The knitters told me some things.
translation.zh: 我的织友跟我说了一些事情

translation.en: I think maybe my first impression of you was wrong.
translation.zh: 或许我对你的第一印象是错的

translation.en: I doubt it. So, who's what's-her-name?
translation.zh: 我表示怀疑 那个女人是谁？

translation.en: -So you were listening? -I may have heard a word or two.
translation.zh: -你听到了？-我可能听到了几个字

translation.en: [exhales] The woman for whom my husband left me.
translation.zh: 我丈夫因为她离开了我
很明显 他是个笨蛋

translation.en: That actually sounded like a compliment.
It's more of an insult to him.
translation.zh: 他听起来就像是侮辱了

translation.en: If I'm being honest, it wasn't all his fault.
translation.zh: 说实话 也不全是他的错

translation.en: I've spent most of the last decade on my computer.
translation.zh: 过去十年里我大部分时间都花在了电脑上

translation.en: [exhales] I was married once. A long time ago.
translation.zh: 我也结过婚 很久以前

translation.en: She left me for someone with a bigger title.
translation.zh: 她为了一个头衔更高的人离开了我

translation.en: When she left me, I came back here to put myself back together.
translation.zh: 她离开我之后我就回到这里治疗情伤

translation.en: Dun Dunbar's been my life ever since.
translation.zh: 从那时起 邓巴城堡就一直陪着我

translation.en: Oh, what am I saying? I sound like a character from one of your books.
translation.zh: 我这是怎么了？我听起来像是你书里的某个角色

translation.en: -So you're reading my books? -Point is, people leave, we survive.
translation.zh: -你在看我的书？-重点是别人走了 我们要好好活着

translation.en: I guess I just never thought I'd be alone at this stage of my life.
translation.zh: 我只是没想过自己会在这个年纪孤身一人

translation.en: Oh, look at the hairy coos.
translation.zh: 看看这些毛茸茸的小牛

translation.en: You might know them as expensive sweaters.
translation.zh: 在你眼里 它们就是昂贵的毛衣

translation.en: [Sophie] Really? You mean like the one you're wearing?
translation.zh: 是吗？比如你身上穿的这件？

translation.en: -[Myles] Ocean view from every room. -Central air conditioning.
translation.zh: -每间房都是海景房-还有中央空调

translation.en: And it comes with its own graveyard.
Exactly. You never have to leave.
translation.zh: 对啊 住进去就永远不用走了

translation.en: [Myles] There's one more place I'd like to show you.
So, this is Dun Glen Holy Well.
[Myles] Locals leave them. Legend dates back to the first Duchess of Dunbar.
translation.zh: 当地人留下的 这个传说可以追溯到第一任邓巴女公爵

translation.en: When war broke out, she donned the garments of a warrior,
translation.zh: 战争爆发时 她披上战甲

translation.en: came to this very well, and laid a necklace on the edge for courage.
translation.zh: 来到这里 把项链放在井边祈求勇气

translation.en: Well, she went off to fight.
Turned out she had the heart of a warrior.
She ended up saving the village and falling in love with a man who fought by her side.
translation.zh: 她救了整个村子的人爱上了和自己并肩作战的男人

translation.en: Aye. If you like that sort of tale.
translation.zh: 对啊 如果你喜欢这种故事的话

translation.en: Wed on Christmas Eve at Dun Dunbar.
translation.zh: 他们于平安夜在邓巴城堡举办了婚礼

translation.en: And every Christmas Eve after that, for a century or two anyway.
translation.zh: 之后在城堡过平安夜的惯例沿袭了一两个世纪

translation.en: Christmas Eve at Dun Dunbar for the village.
translation.zh: 全村人都去邓巴城堡过平安夜

translation.en: Okay… [exhales] …that's the end of the tour.
How about we end it at the pub?
I dinna really hang out there all that much.
-Oh, come on. -No, no, no, I don't wanna.
-What's the matter with you, man? -No, I cannot sing.
translation.zh: -你怎么回事 伙计？-我不会唱歌

translation.en: Course you can sing. Anyone can sing. Here we go. Come on.
translation.zh: 你肯定会唱 大家都会 来吧 快点

translation.en: ♪ By yon bonnie banks And by yon bonnie braes ♪
translation.zh: 傍着青青的山 依着碧绿的水

translation.en: ♪ Where the sun shines bright On Loch Lomond ♪
♪ Where me and my true love Will never meet again ♪
translation.zh: 但我和我爱人永远不能再相见

translation.en: ♪ On the bonnie, bonnie banks Of Loch Lomond ♪
translation.zh: 在那最美丽的罗梦湖岸上

translation.en: ♪ You'll take the high road And I'll take the low road ♪
translation.zh: 你走山路 我走平原

translation.en: ♪ And I'll be in Scotland afore ye ♪
♪ Where me and my true love Will never meet again ♪
translation.zh: 但在那里 我和我的爱人永远不能再相见

translation.en: ♪ On the bonnie, bonnie banks Of Loch Lomond… ♪
translation.zh: 在那最美丽的罗梦湖岸上

translation.en: it's… it's not like this was a date or anything, right?
[Thomas] Well, it's been a month now,
It appears you're warming up to her.
translation.zh: 看来你逐渐对她有好感了
我只是要更加亲近我的敌人

translation.en: -Am I starting to look like them? -No comment.
translation.zh: -我开始像他们了吗？-不予置评

translation.en: No. Look, you've spent your whole life trying not to be them.
translation.zh: 是的 听着你一生都在尽量避免变成他们

translation.en: You've been alone a long time in this castle.
translation.zh: 你一个人住在这个城堡太久了
-我不是一个人 我还有你-对

translation.en: And here the two of us are,
standing around looking at old paintings of people we hated.
translation.zh: 就傻站在这里看着我们讨厌的人

translation.en: [Sophie] What the heck was the well saying?
[Sophie] "The well whispered a story to her longing heart."
translation.zh: “那口井向她渴望已久的心低声诉说故事”
-你好-告诉我你至少开始动笔了
你有什么计划？ （我讨厌艾玛盖尔）

translation.en: I don't have an exact plan.
You can't just run off to Scotland and hide out in a castle.
translation.zh: 你不能就这样跑到苏格兰躲在城堡里

translation.en: I'm not going to tell you that your life depends on writing this book.
translation.zh: 我不会告诉你你的人生就押在这本书上
-天啊 谢谢-但你的职业生涯是

translation.en: And I know you, Sophie. You have worked your whole life for this.
translation.zh: 我了解你 索菲你为写作事业奉献了一生
如果没了事业 你还算什么

translation.en: And this is where the third duchess would retire… Ay, oh.
translation.zh: 这是第三任女公爵退位…

translation.en: Oh my God, that's Sophie Brown!
[Thomas] Everybody, if we could, um, just move on.
translation.zh: 各位 如果我们可以…

translation.en: I've read all your books. Could I have a selfie?
translation.zh: 我读过你所有的书可以和你自拍吗？

translation.en: Right. All right, then. No, let's continue on. That's very good.
translation.zh: 好的 别去了 我们继续参观 很好

translation.en: You know what, Thomas? I have an idea. Why don't I give the tour?
translation.zh: 托马斯 这样如何？我有个主意 不如我带他们参观

translation.en: William Wallace, the very mason who built Edinburgh Castle,
translation.zh: 威廉华莱士 建造爱丁堡城堡的石匠

translation.en: put these in himself, and they are filled with legends.
translation.zh: 亲自把这些石头堆砌在这里它们充满了传奇色彩

translation.en: the sixth Duke of Dunbar barricaded the old castle walls
translation.zh: 第六任邓巴公爵全面封锁了城堡

translation.en: and stood against the British army for three weeks.
[whispers] It was 1746. Fifth duke. Castle held for four weeks.
translation.zh: 当时是1746年 第五任公爵城堡坚守了四个星期

translation.en: [Thomas] Oh, I'm glad to hear it. Glad to hear it.
Well, it looks like we're gonna have to reorder.
Maybe stock some of your books.
translation.zh: 或许应该上架一些你的书

translation.en: -Oh, I wouldn't go that far. -Hey, well done.
translation.zh: -还是适可而止吧-嘿 你真厉害

translation.en: You know, it wouldna be the worst thing to let someone in again.
translation.zh: 看来再次让别人住进来也不是什么坏事

translation.en: I'm trying to get rid of her, you divvy, or have you forgotten?
translation.zh: 我想赶走她 你这白痴 你是忘了吗？
不 她给我做头发了

translation.en: -Oh! I'm sorry I'm late. -[Maisie] Oh, no bother.
Come on. Get in. It's nice and toasty.
translation.zh: 来吧 快上车 里面又舒适又暖和

translation.en: -[Rhona] How are you getting on? -[Sophie] All right. So…
translation.zh: -你最近怎么样？-还好 所以…

translation.en: [clears throat] Whiskey, and leave the bottle.
Maybe he wants to learn how to knit.
[Helen] I tried to teach him when he was wee.
I'm trying to be accommodating here, but, um,
translation.zh: 我也想随和一点 但是…

translation.en: this whole thing, it's not working for me.
You're just… You're too much. You're everywhere.
translation.zh: 你…你太过分了 你无处不在

translation.en: The redecorating, the gift shop, the tours.
You stole my dog. The knitting!
translation.zh: 你还偷了我的狗 还有织友俱乐部！

translation.en: I mean, what's next? You're gonna run for mayor?
translation.zh: 接下来是什么？你要参选市长吗？

translation.en: This was not part of our deal.
translation.zh: 我们的交易不包含这些

translation.en: The one where you drive me out, and I forfeit my overpriced deposit?
translation.zh: 你是指把我赶走让我自愿放弃高昂的定金？

translation.en: I may not have gone to Oxford or Cambridge,
translation.zh: 我可能没上过牛津和剑桥

translation.en: but I know how to read a contract.
No one in their right mind would have signed that, but I did.
translation.zh: 正常人是不会签这种霸王条款的但我签了

translation.en: Because I am staying through escrow,
I will be here on Christmas and New Year's.
translation.zh: 我会在这里过圣诞节还有新年

translation.en: -In fact, I may never leave. -Mm. Maybe this is my next chapter.
translation.zh: 其实 我可能永远不会走了或许这就是我的下一章节

translation.en: Guess I settled that, didn't I?
translation.zh: 看来问题解决了 对吧？
来吧 哈米什 乖狗狗

translation.en: -I don't like unfinished business. -Oh, of course.
translation.zh: -我不喜欢做事做一半-当然了

translation.en: You're getting rid of my father's name.
translation.zh: 你要抹掉我父亲的名字
-谢谢你-我这么做不是为了你

translation.en: He worked here. He's part of the history.
translation.zh: 他在这里工作过 他是历史的一部分

translation.en: -This your way of apologizing? -It is not.
translation.zh: -这就是你的道歉方式吗？-我没在道歉

translation.en: [Sophie] "The well whispered a story to the wind about a woman."
translation.zh: “那口井低声对风儿诉说了一个女人的故事”
女勇士 跟我说句话吧！

translation.en: It's a week before Christmas. I need to at least write the first page.
translation.zh: 还有一个星期就是圣诞节了我至少要完成第一页啊

translation.en: Come on, warrior woman. Come on. Speak to me.
translation.zh: 拜托 女勇士 快 跟我说话

translation.en: Just gonna sit there, or you gonna help me move it in?
translation.zh: 你是打算坐着还是帮我把东西搬进来？

translation.en: [Myles] I brought you a Scotch dresser.
translation.zh: 我给你弄来了一个苏格兰梳妆台

translation.en: Aye. Found it in the attic.
translation.zh: 对啊 我在阁楼上找到的

translation.en: -Oh. -Just, uh, touched it up a bit.
-Emma Gale and I have parted ways. -Oh?
translation.zh: 艾玛盖尔和我分道扬镳了

translation.en: There's actually another story that I would like to tell.
translation.zh: 其实我想写另外一个故事

translation.en: Oh, aye? What kind of story?

translation.zh: 一口井 还有一把剑的故事
-她是村庄的救世主-那敌人是谁？

translation.en: You're gonna have to read it.
Send me a copy when you're back in New York.
translation.zh: 你回纽约后 给我寄一本过来

translation.en: There is something we need to talk about.
So, what do you usually do at Christmas?
this is the first Christmas I'll be without Lexi.
translation.zh: 这是我第一个不跟莱克茜一起过的圣诞节

translation.en: Well, why don't you invite her, then?

translation.zh: 好吧 所以“笨蛋”是白痴的意思
“憨憨”也是“白痴” 那“呆头鹅”呢？

translation.en: Aye, that's more of a moron.
translation.zh: 好吧 这个词更接近傻子的意思

translation.en: Every time we cut down a tree,
we plant two in its place.
I always try to leave things better than I found them.
translation.zh: 我总是努力让一切比最初的样子更美好

translation.en: It's a little early for a party, isn't it?
Well, there will not be any party without their help.
translation.zh: 没有他们的帮助 就不会有派对

translation.en: Or my yule cakes. I'm baking for Dun Dunbar!
translation.zh: 也不能缺了我的圣诞蛋糕我要为邓巴城堡做蛋糕！

translation.en: I can't tell you how much it means to everyone in the village,
translation.zh: 所有村民对在城堡过圣诞节

translation.en: Well, I… I wish I could take the credit, but it's all her.
translation.zh: 我真希望能揽下这功劳但这都托她的福

translation.en: Not that there is an us.
Don't worry about him. He'll just get in the way.
translation.zh: 别管他 他只会碍事

translation.en: I suppose it's about time these things saw the light of day again.
translation.zh: 我想是时候让这些东西重见天日了

translation.en: Hey. You remember this? Your three-legged cow.
translation.zh: 你还记得这个吗？你的三脚牛

translation.en: Three legs is better than whatever this was.
-Hey, don't make fun of my sheep! -[chuckles]
-I worked hard on that. -I know. I remember!
This one cut right in the back of his father's favorite chair.
translation.zh: 这是他从椅背上切下来的那还是他爸爸最喜欢的椅子

translation.en: Then we had to go hide it in the stables! Remember?
translation.zh: 然后我们把这东西藏进马厩了！还记得吗？
织友们 可以开始了吗？

translation.en: ♪ What fun it is to laugh and sing A sleighing song tonight ♪
translation.zh: 今晚滑雪真快乐 把滑雪歌儿唱

translation.en: ♪ Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells… ♪ Hey, come on.
♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride ♪
-Don't. 'Cause I was going to say… -Mm-hmm. -…that I've got three-- Oh. Sorry. -[bell dings]
translation.zh: 别这样 我本来想说 我有三个…

translation.en: Yes. I would like a room for the night, please.
Okay. All we've got left is the Christmas Romance package.
translation.zh: 好的 我们只剩下圣诞浪漫套房了
晚上供应香槟 床上早餐

translation.en: All the Netflix you can binge.

translation.zh: 谢谢你 我们就要这间
-能告诉我你的名字吗？-多纳特利

translation.en: Maybe you're right about this party.
translation.zh: 或许你对派对的看法是对的

translation.en: Did you just say I was right?
that bedroom you liked, where the fifth duke died,
translation.zh: 你喜欢的那间卧室第五任公爵死去的那间

translation.en: Just wanted you to have the worst room.
translation.zh: 我只是想让你住最烂的房间

translation.en: I know. The fifth duke died in the Battle of Culloden.
translation.zh: 我知道 第五任公爵死于卡洛登战役

translation.en: The sixth was thrown from a horse,
and the 11th, your father, died alone in a hotel room in London.
translation.zh: 第11任 你的父亲独自死在伦敦的一个酒店房间

translation.en: I suppose you know how I'm going to die too?
translation.zh: 我想你也知道我的死法吧？

translation.en: I could come up with a few ideas.
I'm sure those could be arranged too.
It's probably all those Christmas lights you made us put up.
translation.zh: 可能是你让我们布置的圣诞灯害我们断电了
好吧 居然怪圣诞节

translation.en: I think you might be needing these.
translation.zh: 这些东西可能派得上用场

translation.en: Judging by your last foray into the electrical problems,
translation.zh: 从你上次试着解决电力故障的结果来看

translation.en: it's going to be a long, dark night.
translation.zh: 今晚将会是个漫漫黑夜

translation.en: [Sophie] I do feel good about this.
I told you, your fans don't want something else.
translation.zh: 我跟你说了 你的粉丝不想要别的

translation.en: Harper's is talking an additional four-book deal.
translation.zh: 哈珀出版社想再续签四本书的合约

translation.en: You'll do the morning shows, tease the new Emma.
translation.zh: 你要上早间节目 宣传新的艾玛小说
或许都不该说索菲布朗了

translation.en: -Who is that? -I'll let you know when I figure it out.
translation.zh: -这人是谁？-我想清楚了就跟你说

translation.en: Well, she better know how to write.
What's with all the candlelight? Did you go back in time?
translation.zh: 烛光是怎么回事？你穿越到过去了吗？

translation.en: Oh my God. You are never coming home, are you?
translation.zh: 天啊 你永远都不回来了 是吗？

translation.en: You are falling for this guy. The… the earl!
translation.zh: 你爱上那家伙了 那个伯爵！

translation.en: You know, I can work with this.
You become a duchess, and we can rebrand you.
translation.zh: 你成为公爵夫人 我们给你重新包装

translation.en: No one is even gonna remember this fiasco. This… This is genius.
translation.zh: 没人会记得这场风波这简直就是天才营销

translation.en: Can't you just admit you have feelings for her, eh?
translation.zh: 你就不能承认自己对她有好感吗？

translation.en: And even if I do, what difference would it make?
translation.zh: 就算我有 会有什么不同吗？

translation.en: This is the happiest I have seen you in years.
translation.zh: 这是你多年来最开心的时光

translation.en: [Sophie] I am sorry I am late.
But I need a group opinion on this dress.
translation.zh: 我需要征求大家对这条裙子的意见

translation.en: I found it in bedroom nine.
Too much? It's totally too much.
[chuckles] I don't even know if it fits. I can alter it.
translation.zh: -我都不知道合不合适-我可以改
我给你们每个人都准备了

translation.en: I… I don't think we should be wearing Dun Dunbar dresses to the party.
translation.zh: 我们不应该穿邓巴城堡的衣服参加派对

translation.en: Not Dun Dunbar. Saks Fifth Avenue.
translation.zh: 不是邓巴城堡的是在萨克斯第五大道买的

translation.en: -[Helen] That's lovely. Oh, thank you. -Thank you.
He'll take a second notion to me when I wear this.
translation.zh: 我穿上这件衣服一定会让他重燃对我的爱火

translation.en: What do you think? Is it me?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？适合我吗？

translation.en: I found this. I thought… maybe I could wear it tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 我找到了这裙子 就想着… 或许我明天晚上可以穿它

translation.en: Unless it belonged to your mother or your grandmother.
You're mad at me over a dress?
translation.zh: 你因为一条裙子生我的气？

translation.en: No, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Wait.
We definitely should not be doing this.
[chuckles] Is there anything I can do to help?
Absolutely nothing. This is my domain.
translation.zh: 绝对不用 这是我的地盘

translation.en: What does it look like? Breakfast.
translation.zh: 看起来像什么？当然是早餐

translation.en: -How very thoughtful of you. -Well, I am nothing if not that.
translation.zh: -你可真是贴心啊-这是我唯一的优点

translation.en: That, uh, that about covers it.
Let's leave these two lovebirds alone.
translation.zh: 我们就别打扰这对小情侣了

translation.en: You do realize the whole village will know within the hour?
translation.zh: 你该知道 不出一小时这事就会传遍整个村子吧？

translation.en: -What are we? -Maybe we don't need a title.
translation.zh: -我们是什么？-或许我们不需要头衔

translation.en: Well, I am the Duke of Dunbar. Really?
Don't tell me you're one of those people who likes snow on Christmas Eve?
translation.zh: 别告诉我你喜欢下雪的平安夜

translation.en: -You look like you wanna say something. -Not really.
-Because I was thinking-- -You've been doing a lot of thinking.
translation.zh: -因为我在想…-你的想法很多啊

translation.en: -What are you thinking? -[laughs] I'm trying not to!
translation.zh: -你有什么想法？-我在试着什么都不想！

translation.en: in the place I've lived my whole life as a guest?
translation.zh: 留在我住了一辈子的地方？

translation.en: Maybe as your boyfriend, then? Or Mr. Emma Gale? What's his name?
translation.zh: 或许作为你的男朋友？还是艾玛盖尔先生？他叫什么来着？

translation.en: Aye. And we know what happened to him.
translation.zh: 对啊 我们都知道他的结局是什么

translation.en: -What are you doing? -What am I doing?
take over the place, take over my whole life,
translation.zh: 占领这个地方 占领我的全部生活

translation.en: and now you offer me a room in my own house!
translation.zh: 现在你又要把我房子里的一个小小房间施舍给我！

translation.en: I should never have let you in in the first place.
translation.zh: 我当初就不该让你住进来

translation.en: You don't get to walk away like that.
translation.zh: 你不能就这样一走了之

translation.en: Do I need your permission, Your Highness?
translation.zh: 我需要你的同意吗 殿下？

translation.en: I can't believe I was starting to think we could be happy here.
translation.zh: 我竟然开始幻想我们可以幸福地生活在一起
-你又说“我们”了-对 “我们” 没错

translation.en: Two people who have just spent three months together.
translation.zh: 在一个屋檐下共同生活了三个月的两个人

translation.en: I was doing just fine until you showed up!
translation.zh: 我本来过得好好的 直到你出现

translation.en: Oh, well, looks like you win, then.
Because this place is just gonna remind me of you.
translation.zh: 因为这个地方只会让我想起你
好好享受你的12间空卧室吧

translation.en: Leave the key on your way out.
Oh, you really are a royal ass.
translation.zh: 你真是个臭屁王室子弟

translation.en: You can't say I didn't warn you!
-[Hamish cries] -I'm gonna miss you, Hamish. Oh.
translation.zh: 我会想你的 哈米什

translation.en: Don't worry. I do it every day.
translation.zh: 没关系 我每天都这么做

translation.en: [Thomas] Are you really just going to let her leave?
Ugh. You and your stubborn Dunbar pride, eh?
translation.zh: 你们邓巴家的人个个都死要面子

translation.en: Castles are meant to have walls around them. People aren't.
translation.zh: 城堡应该树起城墙 但人不应该

translation.en: Without this castle, I have nothing.
translation.zh: 没了城堡 我就什么都没了

translation.en: And what good is this place without anyone in it?
translation.zh: 如果没人住在里面 城堡还有什么意义？

translation.en: My flight leaves tomorrow. I'll need a ride to Edinburgh.
translation.zh: 我的航班明天起飞我需要有人送我去爱丁堡

translation.en: You can come and visit me.

translation.zh: 你们随时都可以去看我

translation.en: And don't worry about your land
because I'm paying off all of your mortgages.
translation.zh: 因为我会把你们的贷款都还上

translation.en: I'll work everything out when I get back.
translation.zh: 等我回到美国 会把所有事情办妥

translation.en: Oh, Sophie, you can't do that.
translation.zh: 索菲 你不能这样做

translation.en: Consider it a gift from Emma Gale.
translation.zh: 就当是来自艾玛盖尔的礼物吧

translation.en: [voice breaking] Your friendship… means the world to me.
translation.zh: 你们的友情…对我才是最重要的

translation.en: I just made a mistake. That's all.
translation.zh: 我只是犯了一个错误 仅此而已

translation.en: Loving someone is never a mistake.
translation.zh: 爱一个人 永远不是过错

translation.en: I guess we'll be giving you your Christmas present now, then.
translation.zh: 看来我们现在就得把圣诞礼物给你

translation.en: Oh, I just… I love it.
In case you change your mind.
[Eamon] What's going on? Let's have a wee look here.

translation.zh: 坏掉了 就这么说吧

translation.en: -[spluttering] What are you doing? -We're going back.
To the pub. For a wee dram.
He cannot be the only driver in town.
translation.zh: 他不可能是小镇上唯一的司机

translation.en: Edinburgh's two hours away, longer in the snow,
translation.zh: 爱丁堡距离这里两个小时的车程下雪会走得更慢

translation.en: and everyone's going to the party.
translation.zh: 而且大家都要去参加派对
-大家都要去吗？-这不是你的设想吗？

translation.en: All right. I can borrow your car, and I will have it driven back.
translation.zh: 好吧 我可以借你的车然后让别人开回来

translation.en: When was the last time you drove a stick on the left-hand side of the road?
translation.zh: 你上次开手动挡靠左行驶是什么时候？

translation.en: It is in Edinburgh. My husband just called me from the road.
translation.zh: 爱丁堡下着呢我丈夫刚刚在路上给我打电话了

translation.en: What about you, Angus? Will you drive me to the airport?
translation.zh: 你呢 安格斯？你能送我去机场吗？

translation.en: Stay the night. Someone will get you out in the morning.
translation.zh: 留一晚吧 早上会有人送你走的

translation.en: But I'm not going to that party.
You're just gonna spend Christmas Eve here alone?
translation.zh: 你要在这里孤零零地过平安夜吗？
嘿 亲爱的 莱克茜

translation.en: It's Mom. I just wanted to wish you a Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 是妈妈 我想祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: Hey, if she throws the bouquet, don't catch it.
translation.zh: 她扔捧花时 你可别接

translation.en: "It was a coma brought on by his fall down the stairs."
[Sophie] "To her shock, it wasn't Winston whose body lay there."
translation.zh: “令她震惊的是躺在那里的不是温斯顿”
“而是他的双胞胎哥哥迈尔斯”

translation.en: -[Myles] All right, come on, then. -[horse whinnying]
I… I've done things a certain way for a long time,
translation.zh: 我早就养成了某种习惯

translation.en: and to have someone come in and just… [exhales]
I guess it finally hit me that I'm losing the place.
translation.zh: 看来我终于意识到自己要失去这个地方了

translation.en: But I'd rather lose Dun Dunbar…
translation.zh: 但我宁愿失去邓巴城堡

translation.en: You wanna go back to America? I won't stop you.
translation.zh: 你想回美国吗？我不会阻止你

translation.en: But I can't promise I won't follow you.
translation.zh: 但我不能保证不会跟你去

translation.en: hopelessly and pathetically in love with you.
translation.zh: 无可救药 可怜兮兮地爱上了你

translation.en: I love you, too, you dobber.
-Hi! -Lovely to see you. Have a great night.
translation.zh: -嗨！-很高兴见到你们 祝你们今晚愉快

translation.en: You're gonna have to do it for him.
No, I'm going to do something for myself.
translation.zh: 不 我要为自己做一件事

translation.en: would you do me the honor of a dance?
can I have your attention, please?
this place was as cold as the winds off the Firth of Forth.
translation.zh: 这里都像福斯湾吹来的风一般冰冷

translation.en: I thought this castle was who I was.
translation.zh: 我以为这座城堡就是我

translation.en: Or maybe even all I was.
then, I met a lass who knocked me flat on my royal arse…
translation.zh: 然后我遇到了一个女孩她把我的皇室臭脾气治得服服帖帖

translation.en: …and she taught me that we should be with the people we love on Christmas.
translation.zh: 她教会我圣诞节应该和爱的人在一起

translation.en: And so from this Christmas on,
translation.zh: 所以 从这个圣诞节开始

translation.en: Dun Dunbar will throw a party to end all parties for the village.
translation.zh: 邓巴城堡每年都会为村子举办最盛大的圣诞节派对
卡勒姆麦坚迪的外孙女
他曾在这片土地上工作

translation.en: and had stones enough to carve his name in this very castle.
translation.zh: 而且还大胆到将自己的名字刻在这座城堡里

translation.en: Myles got me a plane ticket.
translation.zh: 迈尔斯给我买了张机票

translation.en: Oh. What about your father's wedding?
Nah, I'll just go to the next one.
Well, you did go to Oxford.

translation.zh: -敬麦坚迪一家-敬麦坚迪一家！
罗娜 你又在甜点上超越了自己

translation.en: -She should have a shop. -Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: -她应该开店的-对 当然了

translation.en: -Have you had one of these? -Oh my lord!
-Rhona has gone mad. She is wonderful. -Now that is a work of art.
translation.zh: -罗娜这个糕点狂魔 她太棒了-这就是一件艺术品
祝你圣诞快乐 哈米什

translation.en: [Sophie] All right, what do you think of this?
translation.zh: 好了 你觉得这名字怎么样？

translation.en: I've got a wee present for you.
translation.zh: 我给你准备了一个小礼物

translation.en: Adam, don't forget to cue me. Okay, perfect. Thank you.
translation.zh: 亚当 别忘了提示我 好的 很好 谢谢

translation.en: Are we shooting them on all three cameras?
translation.zh: 这三台摄像机都在拍吗？

translation.en: on your huge, new best seller, Heart of a Warrior.
translation.zh: 你的《勇士之心》大卖成为最新畅销书

translation.en: -Thank you. It is so nice to be back. -[audience clapping]
translation.zh: 谢谢 很高兴能再次做客节目

translation.en: Everybody feels that this is your best novel yet.
translation.zh: 大家都觉得这是你最好的小说

translation.en: Oh! Oh, it's my best book yet. Guess we do get a happy ending.
translation.zh: 这是我最好的一本书看来确实存在幸福的结局

translation.en: -That's what people want. -Not that kind of a happy ending.
translation.zh: -这就是人们想要的-不是那种“性”福结局

translation.en: Since you were last here, it seems like your life has become a total fairy tale.
translation.zh: 自从你上次做客节目你的生活好像变成了童话故事

translation.en: You bought a castle in Scotland, moved to Ireland… Scot-land.
translation.zh: 你在苏格兰买了一座城堡搬去了爱尔兰…苏格兰乐园
-那是个新的省份-在迪士尼乐园附近

translation.en: -It's a little to the side. Yeah. -[Drew] Exactly.
Is it fair to say that you're going to become a duchess?
translation.zh: 你就要成为公爵夫人了可以这么说吗？

translation.en: Uh… Wait, do we get married, or do you just… What?
translation.zh: 等等 我们结婚了吗？还是你…什么？

translation.en: -I know. -Five days a week. Know what I mean?
translation.zh: -我知道-一周五天 你懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: …and a huge congratulations on your juggernaut best seller.
translation.zh: 热烈祝贺你的畅销书强悍来袭

translation.en: I also don't wanna say the word "juggernaut."
translation.zh: 我不喜欢“强悍来袭”这个说法

translation.en: No, no, it was funny that she came out with that, with her head and her brain.
translation.zh: 不 以她的水平想出这个词还挺有意思的

translation.en: "Juggernaut" is a very harsh, male, masculine,
translation.zh: “强悍来袭”很刺耳 很大男子主义

translation.en: not sexy, pretty, feminine, soft word.
translation.zh: 不性感、不可爱没有女性色彩、不柔和

translation.en: ♪ Ye who sang creation's story ♪ ♪ Now proclaim Messiah's birth ♪
translation.zh: （谨以此片怀念玛莎凯莉兰伯特）
